title: Hongkongese is the descent of inbreds and traitors

replies.msg:
Our parents or grandparents abandoned their home and came to Hong Kong. They were a bunch of cowards who betrayed their people when there was a hard time. They did not stand by their people. They also bought their stupidity into Hong Kong like some transitional Chinese values and myths which significantly damage people brains. Chinese study and education have made us weaker and dumber. Our family should be guilty for the failure of Hong Kong. Our blood is fucking dirty because we are carrying the blood of traitors. All the injustice and unfairness in the Hong Kong society are caused by the stupidity of our family.
Do you agree with me ?
好on9 好片面.  大部分美國人都係英國過去. 咁又係叛國？
